fpsreducer.config.screen.title: FPS 減速器配置
fpsreducer.config.advanced.screen.title: FPS 減速器進階選項
fpsreducer.config.menu.reducingInGameMen: 在遊戲目錄中減少 FPS
fpsreducer.config.menu.reducingInBackgro: 非活動狀態時減少 FPS
fpsreducer.config.menu.suppressSound: 非活動狀態時降低音量
fpsreducer.config.menu.guiScreenFps: 開啟介面時的最高 FPS
fpsreducer.config.hudPosAdj.description: 從位於畫面邊緣的八個複選框中選擇一個參考位置，然後移動顯示 FPS 文字的選框。您也可以使用方向鍵或 WASD 移動選框。
fpsreducer.config.tooltip.waitingTime: The waiting time until the client shifts to the idle state when there is no operation. Can be turned off by moving the slider to the right edge.
fpsreducer.config.tooltip.idleFps: Max FPS at idle state. The FPS will be reduced to this value, when there is no operation for a specified period of time.
fpsreducer.config.tooltip.guiScreenFps: Max FPS in GUI screens such as the inventory screen and the menu screens.
fpsreducer.config.tooltip.noActFps: Max FPS during no operation. After detecting no operation, the FPS is immediately limited to this value.
fpsreducer.config.tooltip.profile.modest:
§eProfile: §oModest Eco§r
FPS will be reduced when the client is in background or in ESC menu. (Default)
fpsreducer.config.tooltip.profile.eco:
§eProfile: §oEco§r
Almost same as the default setting of FPS Reducer 1. FPS will be reduced when the client is in background, in ESC menu or no operation for 10 minutes.
fpsreducer.config.tooltip.profile.coolin:
§eProfile: §oSituational Cooling (Low)§r
Proactively control the load depending on the situation. (For PC that runs at 60fps or higher.) In addition to the behavior of Eco profile, FPS will be limited to 60fps when the character is stationary, in inventory screen or in any GUI screen. Depending on VSync and Max Framerate settings in the Video Settings, the effect will be less effective.

§eProfile: §oSituational Cooling (High)§r
More powerful load suppression depending on the situation. (For weak PC.) In addition to the behavior of Eco profile, FPS will be limited to 30fps when the character is stationary, in inventory screen or in any GUI screen.
